name: sonography

the process of examining organs inside the body using ultrasound (= sound waves) and producing images of them: Sonography is important in monitoring the health of a pregnant woman and her unborn baby. The thickening of the gall bladder seen by sonography subsided after two weeks. Related words

sonographer
